basic.name: Spider Mines (Q)
basic.description:
Create 3 mines that arm after 1.25 seconds. Mines detonate when an enemy comes in range, dealing 96 damage to nearby enemies and Slowing them by 25% for 1.5 seconds.

Siege Mode: Cast range increased by 100%.

basic.name: Concussive Blast (W)
basic.description:
Deal 141 damage to enemies in front of Sgt. Hammer and knock them back.

Siege Mode: Radius increased by 50%.

basic.name: Neosteel Plating (E)
basic.description:
Gain 25 Armor for 2 seconds.

Siege Mode: Grants 100% more Armor.

heroic.name: Blunt Force Gun (R)
heroic.description: Fire a missile across the battlefield, dealing 500 damage to non-Structure enemies in its path.

heroic.name: Napalm Strike (R)
heroic.description: Deals 164 damage on impact, and leaves a napalm area that deals 50 damage per second. Lasts for 4 seconds.

trait.name: Siege Mode (T)
trait.description: Activate to enter Siege Mode. While in Siege Mode, Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage, have 100% increased range, and deal 25% of their damage as splash damage around the target.
passives: {highlight}Heat Tank: While under siege mode Sgt. Hammer can move at 50% of her base move speed but each time she auto attacks that movespeed decreases by 2.5% capping at 25% slowly regaining the speed after 2 seconds not shooting. Mounting reset the heat effect{/highlight}

1.name: Advanced Siege Tech
1.description: {highlight}Increase the siege mount and dismount speed by 100% and also grants cleanse on that period{/highlight}

1.name: Advanced Artillery
1.description: Increase Siege Mode's splash damage to 60% of Basic Attack damage, and increase its splash radius by 25%.

1.name: Maelstrom Rounds
1.description: {highlight}Activate while in siege mode to increase Sgt Hammer attack speed by 60% for 3 seconds, Sgt Hammer won't be able to move during that duration, hitting enemy heroes or structures reduces the cooldown by 2 seconds{/highlight}

4.name: New: Mounting spiders
4.description: {highlight}When you mount and dismount spawn 4 spider mines around Sgt. Hammer. When you mount and dismount also heals 10% of Sgt. Hammer maximum health. {/highlight}

4.name: Siege Tactics
4.description: Using Neosteel Plating while in Siege Mode grants Unstoppable for 2 seconds, as long as she remains in Siege Mode.

4.name: Regenerative Bio-Steel
4.description: Basic Attacks while in Siege Mode heal for 10% of the damage dealt.

7.name: Pulse Detonation Core
7.description: Spider Mines detonate 3 times over 3 seconds. Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes grant 5 Mana and reduce the cooldown of Spider Mines by 1.5 seconds. Increase this bonus to 2.5 seconds while in Siege Mode.

7.name: Hover Siege Mode
7.description: {highlight}Decrease Heat Tank speed lost with basic attacks to 1.25% also increase the maximum move speed to 60%{/highlight}

7.name: Graduating Range
7.description: {highlight}While under siege mode if you don't shoot you progressively increase you range up to 3 and basic attack damage up to 200% on a period of 2.5seconds.{/highlight}

10.name: Blunt Force Gun
10.description: Fire a missile across the battlefield, dealing 500 damage to non-Structure enemies in its path.

10.name: Napalm Strike
10.description: Deals 164 damage on impact, and leaves a napalm area that deals 50 damage per second. Lasts for 4 seconds.

13.name: Tactical Mine Deployment
13.description: Moving while Thrusters is active leaves a trail of up to 5 Spider Mines. Additionally, increase the Slow of Spider Mines by 15% {highlight}and duration by 200%.{/highlight}

13.name: Jump blast
13.description: {highlight}Activate to knock enemies around Sgt. Hammer and make her reposition herself with ground thrusters while on siege mode.{/highlight}

13.name: Hyper-Cooling Engines
13.description: While in Siege Mode, hitting Heroes with Basic Attacks reduces the cooldown of Thrusters by 5 seconds.

16.name: Mechanical Know-how
16.description: Neosteel Plating grants 20% maximum Health as a Shield for 2 seconds and increases Basic Attack damage by 30% for 5 seconds.

16.name: Emp shoot
16.description: {highlight}Activate to empower Sgt. Hammer next attack to deal 600% extra damage to shield, stun the target hit for 0.75 seconds and knock back all targets that received collateral damage.{/highlight}

16.name: Giant Killer
16.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1.5% of the Hero's maximum Health.

20.name: Orbital BFG
20.description: Blunt Force Gun's missile orbits the planet every 5 seconds. Only the last missile fired orbits.

20.name: Advanced Spider Strike
20.description: Napalm Strike's range is increased by 75% {highlight}and deploy 4 spider mines on impact.{/highlight}
passives: {highlight}Spider mines now decrease 5 armor up to 25 for 4 seconds when hitting enemy heroes{/highlight}

20.name: Immortality Protocol
20.description: {highlight}After Sgt. Hammer dies she become a destroyed unit with 75% of her base hit points and can't be healed. If she is not kill under 5 seconds she will revive. Allied heros can interact with the debris, each interacting allied hero increases the revive speed by 50%. {/highlight}

20.name: Ultra Capacitors
20.description: Hitting enemy Heroes with Basic Attacks while in Siege Mode grants 10% Attack Speed for 5 seconds, up to 60%.
